body.description: Hyland's Migraine Relief offers a natural solution to relieve migraines, that is tough on pain yet gentle on the body. Made with natural active ingredients. It safely and naturally relieves pounding or throbbing pain, dull or frontal headaches, light or noise sensitivity, nausea, dizziness and blurred vision. It doesn't contain caffeine, acetaminophen, ibuprofen or other NSAIDs, has no side effects and can safely be taken with other over-the-counter or prescription medication as it has no known drug interactions. Quick dissolving tablets melt instantly in your mouth, no water needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Natural Active Ingredients The natural active ingredients work with your body to provide natural relief that is tough on pain, yet gentle on the body. This medication does not contain acetaminophen, ibuprofen, naproxen, aspirin or any other NSAIDs so it is safe and free of chemicals. No Side Effects Gentle on stomach, liver and kidneys, so you feel better, safely. Non-habit forming, Non-drowsy, No known long-term harm or side effects. No Known Drug Interactions Hyland's Naturals Migraine Relief can safely complement your other prescription or over-the-counter medications. This homeopathic medicine is made with natural active ingredients that have no known drug interactions. Easy, Convenient, Quick-Dissolving Tablets No water needed, conveniently take them anytime, anywhere. Instantly melts in your mouth. No upset stomach.

Yes, Hyland's Naturals Migraine Relief has no known drug interactions and is safe to use with over-the-counter or prescription medication you may have. It is safe and gentle on your body, with no side effects. Just take your Hyland's Naturals Migraine Relief at the onset of your migraine. Dissolve 2 tablets under your tongue every 15 minutes up to 4 doses, then every 4 hours until relieved, no water needed. Refer to directions on back of packaging under drug facts. Hyland's Naturals Migraine Relief uses the healing power of natural active ingredients carefully selected to relieve symptoms associated with a migraine, such as the plant Iris Versicolor, known mostly as a migraine remedy. It gently and safely relieves blurred vision, headache and nausea. This formula doesn't contain caffeine, acetaminophen, ibuprofen or other NSAID's.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my migraines manageable in 30-60min
reviews.reviewText: I don't get an aura before my migraines start, so by the time I take these, I'm already suffering. I do find that if I can take them right when the migraine starts, they seem to stop it from getting as intense and make it go away faster, but even if I can't do that for some reason, they help reduce both the intensity and duration of the migraine. They don't taste like anything and dissolve quickly; if you get severe nausea with your migraines that might still be a no-go, but I find them easy to tolerate.When possible, I combine them with rest and use of a neck/shoulder heating pad (which by itself helps only slightly but seems to be a really good combination with the medicine), and my migraines -- which left untreated would typically last 6+ hours (sometimes even more than a day) -- are usually done within 3 hours. Moreover, within 30-60 minutes, the medicine makes my migraine manageable enough that I can enjoy a quiet activity and even comfortably eat.Hyland's continues to be my go-to for over-the-counter medicine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth a try!
reviews.reviewText: I get several types of headaches and chronic migraines. Hylands Migraine Relief has been a huge part in keeping them at bay. It helps with the regular headaches as well as the intensity of my migraines. I use in in conjunction with my onset medication or before I start getting a migraine if I feel aura or a headache that will trigger one. It’s not a strong flavor at all, if you even taste it. You dissolve it under the tongue for maximum sublingual absorption. I love that it helps with the sharp pains I get before a migraine attack as well as nausea. It’s something I always keep on hand now.Personally I prefer the old packaging. It’s less bulky and more compact. The new bottle leaks some of the dust in the bottle, the old packaging doesn’t.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These really help with my migraines
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had migraines since I was a lil girl. I don’t like all the medication that have side effects. These are the only thing I take. I have migraines probably 3 to 4 times a week. Very debilitating. I swear up and down by these. Please try them. Every person I’ve told about these and has tried them has had excellent results too. Migraines are miserable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not relieve migraines
reviews.reviewText: I just finished my bottle. The taste was decent, but I won't be purchasing again. The downfall of the product is it's failure to do the one it's intended for- relieve migraines. This product does NOT RELIEVE MIGRAINES! Can you imagine having one of the worse migraines, taking these pills, only for them to not relieve the pain, it really sucks. I see many reviews expressing how well the pills worked for them, I like to believe they have minor headaches or migraines because this product is ridiculous. As instructed on the bottle, I placed two tablets under my tongue, had it melt in my mouth, and every 15 minutes I repeated for 4 doses maximum. Unfortunately for me, even after following the directions on the bottle, my migraines still persisted. Not once did this product work for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well but
reviews.reviewText: I took this when my migraine started like I knew the signs .. It worked for about an hour . Two hours later - my migraine percolating. Took it again - it took the edge of the migraine but I still felt the pressure of the migraine slightly . I waited and took two every two hours with lots of water .. By the end of the day it was gone .. it’s not as fast as say iburophen . However if you just have a headache this works well. Migranes you have to be patient with the process … Thst being said - I rather this product then aspirin or ipruphen with all their chemicals abs side affects I prefer this product. I gave it a four because if your a migraine person this product will work but you will still be left with the mild onsets of migraine .. However , prefer this then the alternative … Also, since taking this product I haven’t really had any recent reoccurring migraines like I did in the past.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for me...
reviews.reviewText: Didn't really notice a difference for my migraines. However, they might work great for you. They do taste decent.
